See our past recommendations here!In the five-ish years that I’ve lived in New York, where we are all essentially swaddled in a warm blanket of germs, I have never needed to go to the doctor for being sick. *Aggressively knocks on wood*  And when people ask how, the answer is always Wellness Formula vitamins.Every time I feel a little off—scratch in the back of my throat, clammy hands, runny nose—I take six capsules twice a day. Within a day or two, I am completely free of any symptoms. That’s because each capsule is packed with antioxidants, herbal extracts, vitamins, and minerals—from garlic bulb to echinacea to astragalus—that each address and support a specific part of your immune system. I like to think of Wellness Formula as the Marvel movie of vitamins, with every ingredient (there are over 30 of them!) doing its part to fight off the evil New York germs plotting an attack on my immune system. – Rachel Karten, senior social media manager.Buy it: Source Naturals Wellness Formula, $31 for 240 capsules.All products featured on Healthyish are independently selected by our editors.
